instructions.title: How to get your RapidAPI Key:

steps.0: Visit Genius Lyrics API on RapidAPI
steps.1: Sign in or create a RapidAPI account if you don't have one
steps.2: Subscribe to the API (there's a free tier available)
steps.5: Look for the "X-RapidAPI-Key" in the code examples

instructions.note: Note: The free tier includes 100 requests per day which is sufficient for testing and personal use.

instructions.title: How to get your YouTube API Key:

steps.1: Create a new project or select an existing one
steps.2: Enable the YouTube Data API v3
steps.3: Go to Credentials and create an API key

instructions.note: Note: The free tier includes 10,000 requests per day which is sufficient for normal use.
